subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: BEIJING — It was listed as a training session, but Thursday night was a moment of reckoning for Emily Silver. After her American Olympic teammates were done with practice, they lined the length of the 50-meter pool at the Water Cube in a show of support for Silver, who was going to race against the clock in the 100-meter freestyle.
